author: gartung
body:
Validation/RecoEgamma : Fix clang warning [-Wtautological-constant-out-of-range-compare]

    warning: comparison of constant 140 with expression of type 'reco::GsfElectron::Classification' is always true [-Wtautological-constant-out-of-range-compare]
    classification()!= 140);
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^  ~~~

    Store return value on ClassificationVariables::classification() in a temporary variable and then compare to the "magic numbers". This is obviously an unused algor
title: Validation/RecoEgamma : Fix clang warning [-Wtautological-constant-out-of-range-compare]
